About Me

Hi! My name is Dom and I'm a front-end web developer who utilizes modern techniques to create beautiful, intuitive and responsive web pages. I specialize in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, SASS/SCSS, Semantic elements, and have a strong attention to detail. I also have working knowledge with Balsamiq, Photoshop, and CoffeeCup to design UI wireframes and workflow. Currently working on learning the React framework but always willing to learn more and expand my knowledge.

  • Git, GitHub, FTP
